subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Green Monkey, at $16 million the most expensive horse purchased at auction, never mounted a serious threat, finishing third in a six-furlong maiden special-weight race at Belmont Park. The Green Monkey was sent off as the 2-5 favorite despite taking on five experienced rivals. Roi Maudit ($22.80) won, with Sixthirteen second and The Green Monkey seven lengths behind the winner.
